__e: You told me it was because you believed in right and wrong.

You were just doing what you thought was right. Even if you were dead wrong.
What the hell do you think you're doing, letting yourself in here like this?
Right, I don't know what that shit were you pulled last night, but I didn't appreciate it.
- For someone you thought you'd killed.

And everything you thought you knew about me, you don't.
He's still in your life, but you did lose the father that you thought you had.

I said, "is everything where you thought it would be?"
When you married Dad, you thought he was the greatest person in the world, right?
I know how hard it is to discover the person you love... Is not what you think they were.
I get it. He was there for you when you thought nobody else was.
You screwed me over and you thought and you thought I wasn't gonna know it was you, but I know!

That I took for myself what you believed to be yours.
